item.title: Trump Wins Again. Big Beautiful Bill Headed To The President’s Desk
item.description: The signature domestic policy victory is another in a long line of brutal political butt-kickings Teflon Trump has delivered to the Democrats.

item.title: In 1976 We Celebrated America’s Bicentennial By Painting Fire Hydrants, And It Was Magical
item.description: We have reason to feel hopeful this Independence Day, as we are intentionally remembering our history. It mattered in 1976, and it matters now.

item.title: After UPenn, These Nine Schools Should Apologize For Trans Policies Or Lose Funding
item.description: UPenn came to an agreement with the Depart. of Education not because it was the right thing to do but because it could have lost funding.
